casebody.data:
ANNE ELIZABETH MYERS, a widow, (sometimes and otherwise known an ANNE E. MYERS, individually and as the Residuary Devisee and as the Executrix of the last Will and Testament of A. J. Myers, deceased, v. THOMAS S. FERGUSON. 32 So. (2nd) 432

June Term, 1947

November 4, 1947 En Banc Rehearing denied November 26, 1947.

Affirmed.
